## SendableGivety.unstakeGVTY() method

Withdraw GVTY from staking.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unstakeGVTY(amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentGivetyTransaction<S, GivetyReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of GVTY to withdraw. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[SentGivetyTransaction](./lib-base.sentgivetytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [GivetyReceipt](./lib-base.givetyreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the GVTY stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.gvtystake.collateralgain.md) and [GUSD gain](./lib-base.gvtystake.gusdgain.md)<!-- -->.
